info.title: Request Server
info.description:
Request Server API for the Singapur Project. Its mainly purposes are retrieving requests and updating its status 
 Confluence URL:/ https://steps.everis.com/confluence/display/PROLEMER/Microservice+Request

get.summary: Retrieve requests by status taking in consideration that a request can have multiple offeredService

200.description: The status introduced is correct and a list of requests is returned

get.summary: Retrieve professional request taking in consideration that a request can have multiple offeredService

200.description: The request is found and returned to the user
The request is found and returned to the user

get.summary: This method obtain the Request Info by clientId and requestId and it takes in consideration that a request can have multiple services

200.description: The status of the request is updated

400.description:
Bad Request 
 SPRO-400-1 Invalid input parameters

get.summary: Retrieve all records of the historical changes status by request Id

200.description: The status introduced is correct and a list of requests is returned
A list of requests is returned

get.summary: Find by status and update date

delete.summary: Delete a record of the request status history by Id

200.description: The historical status has been deleted correctly
The request is found and returned to the user
